newsitem.title: UK: LIFFE sugar mixed in PM after funds stop buying.
newsitem.headline: LIFFE sugar mixed in PM after funds stop buying.

text.p: LIFFE sugar was mixed in afternoon trading as the gains caused by fund buying in the morning fell away, traders said.
"We saw some good fund buying in the morning," one trader said. Funds had bought just over 1,000 lots, he reckoned.
But lack of follow through from the funds left prices to fall in the afternoon, another said. "It's not out of line with New York. It just got a bit overbought and it's come back into line," he said.
By 1515 GMT, front month October, which has dominated the day's volume was 60 cents lower at $322.20. Of a total 2,816 lots so far, 2,230 were on October.
